docna.cdata!:
Argentina - Balcarce Livestock Project :
            Loan 0505 - Project Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Argentina - Balcarce Livestock
            Project : Loan 0505 - Project Agreement - Conformed

docna.cdata!:
Argentina - Balcarce Livestock Project :
            Loan 0505 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

display_title.display_title:
Argentina - Balcarce Livestock
            Project : Loan 0505 - Loan Agreement - Conformed

abstracts.cdata!:
The project consists mainly of the
            provision to cattle ranchers and farm machinery contractors
            of long and medium-term credit and technical services for
            the carrying out of ranch dvelopment plans approved by a
            Project Director appointed by the Instituto Nacional de
            Tecnologia Agropecuaria (INTA) and acceptable to the Bank.
            The project also includes drainage and soil studies to be
            carried out by INTA with the help of consultants and beef
            marketing studies to be undertaken by the Consejo Nacional
            de Desarrollo (CONADE) also assisted by consultants.
